placesToVisit.name: El Faro de Rincon
placesToVisit.description: The iconic Rincon Lighthouse offers panoramic views of the ocean, ideal for whale watching and sunset views.

placesToVisit.name: Marias Beach
placesToVisit.description: A popular destination for surfers and beach lovers, known for its beautiful sunsets and laid-back atmosphere.

placesToVisit.name: Sandy Beach
placesToVisit.description: A favorite among locals and tourists for its golden sands, clear waters, and vibrant nightlife.

restaurants.name: Tamboo
restaurants.description: Seaside dining offering a mix of local and international cuisine, with stunning views of the ocean.

restaurants.name: The Beach House
restaurants.description: A relaxed atmosphere with an emphasis on fresh, local seafood, perfect for a casual meal by the water. It's the perfect spot to watch the sunset, and it also features live music on Sundays around sunset time.

restaurants.name: The English Rose
restaurants.description: Nestled in the hills of Rincon, offering a unique breakfast and brunch menu with breathtaking views.

placesToVisit.name: Playa Sucia
placesToVisit.description: Offering breathtaking views, crystal-clear waters, and plenty of wilderness to explore, this beach is part of the town’s nature reserve. Just steps away from Los Morrillos Lighthouse.

placesToVisit.name: Playa Buyé
placesToVisit.description: Playa Buyé offers tranquil, clear waters and pristine white sands, ideal for relaxation and snorkeling.

placesToVisit.name: Boqueron Beach
placesToVisit.description: A bustling beach town famous for its wide, family-friendly beach, vibrant community, and delicious street food.

restaurants.name: Buena Vibra Bar & Tapas
restaurants.description: Offers a lively setting with creative local and international tapas, perfect for enjoying crafted cocktails and vibrant ambiance

restaurants.name: El Mercado Boqueron
restaurants.description: It's an open, relaxed atmosphere with tapas, cocktails, and main dishes including fresh fish.

restaurants.name: Bamboleio
restaurants.description: Local, very fresh, creative seafood, and puertorrican favorites specialties. Panoramic sea view and artisan bar.

placesToVisit.name: Seven Seas Beach
placesToVisit.description: The water in this beach is calm and crystal clear, making it a perfect spot for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, hiking, and more. You can also do a walk to Playa Colora and Playa Escondida.

placesToVisit.name: La Zanja
placesToVisit.description: La Zanja is a natural pool created when the waves from the Atlantic crash on the rocks and fill in the long, “ditch-like” indentation. If you like adventure, it’s about a 20- to 30-minute hike from Seven Seas to this secluded location, and you’ll get to enjoy some scenery along the road less-traveled.

placesToVisit.name: Playa Escondida and Playa Colorá
placesToVisit.description: Playa Escondida and Playa Colorá are two of Fajardo’s hidden gems. To get to them you will have to do a little bit of hiking. To reach Playa Escondida and Playa Colorá, you'll need to do a 25-minute hike from Seven Seas Beach through a mangrove forest.

restaurants.name: Seven Seas Food Park
restaurants.description: Located in Seven Seas Beach, these food trucks offer a wide variety of local foods and drinks for all tastes, so you can come to eat and enjoy a spectacular beach atmosphere, breeze, and sea with your entire family.

restaurants.name: Cinco Nudos
restaurants.description: It's located inside Fajardo's Marina Puerto Rico. This restaurant highlights the delicacies of the sea merged with traditional creole techniques.

restaurants.name: Las Vistas Café
restaurants.description: An open-terrace with a view overlooking the Cabezas de San Juan Nature Reserve is the perfect setting for a delicious, homey brunch at Las Vistas Café.

placesToVisit.name: Ponce Art Museum
placesToVisit.description: Explore a rich collection of Puerto Rican and European art in a beautiful museum located in the heart of Ponce.

placesToVisit.name: La Guancha Boardwalk
placesToVisit.description: Enjoy a vibrant waterfront experience at La Guancha, featuring restaurants, shops, and a scenic boardwalk in Ponce.

placesToVisit.name: Museo Castillo Serrallés
placesToVisit.description: A 1930s palace converted into a local history museum, featuring elaborately landscaped gardens in its surroundings.

placesToVisit.name: Caja de Muertos
placesToVisit.description: Take a boat trip to Caja de Muertos (Coffin Island), a nature reserve with beautiful beaches and hiking trails.

restaurants.name: Panadería y Repostería La Comercio
restaurants.description: Operating for over 25 years, Panadería y Repostería La Comercio offers a variety of pastry sweets, bread, a selection of sandwiches, juices, among other items. We provide wholesale services for cafes and/or restaurants.

restaurants.name: La Casa del Chef
restaurants.description: Local art on the walls gives this eatery a bright, lively atmosphere, but the service and Puerto Rican haute cuisine are what truly set it apart. A few of the local-favorite dishes include lobster a la Criolla, fresh octopus salad, and savory mofongo. Also on the menu at La Casa del Chef, you will find a variety of seafood and meat cuts as well as tasty homemade desserts.

placesToVisit.name: Luquillo Beach
placesToVisit.description: Known as 'La Monserrate,' Luquillo Beach is a beautiful crescent-shaped beach with calm waters and a backdrop of lush green mountains.

placesToVisit.name: El Yunque National Forest
placesToVisit.description: Explore the tropical rainforest of El Yunque, located nearby, with hiking trails, waterfalls, and diverse flora and fauna.

placesToVisit.name: Balneario Monserrate
placesToVisit.description: A family-friendly beach area with clear waters and facilities, perfect for a day of swimming, picnics, and relaxation.

restaurants.name: La Parrilla
restaurants.description: A popular grill restaurant in Luquillo were is located in 'Los kioskos de Luquillo' were are more then 60 establishments but, La Parrilla  offers a variety of grilled meats and local specialties in a lively atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Boardriders Surf Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: Located near the beach, Boardriders offers a relaxed setting with surf-themed decor and a menu featuring fresh seafood and tropical drinks.

restaurants.name: Carabali Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: It offers traditional Puerto Rican dishes in a casual and fun atmosphere. Also counts with a paradisiacal land teeming with lush flora and fauna, making it one of the favorite adventure destinations on the island. Our park allows you to experience the rainforest through a variety of exciting tours and excursions.
